name: Getting a job at Dracula's
description:
SUBMISSION FOR SODORJAM MARCH 2023 (theme: castlevania clone)
this game is a spiritual successor to paper links 

This game is the definition of bit of more than i can chew. In 2 weeks i made this game with:

  • 20+ characters
  • a big open word to explore
  • a bit of (unfinished) story
  • freshly made assets/ shaders and code
  • twitch integration
  • no sounds
  • 20 gecks

I have worked days and nights and this is the result I hope you'll enjoy

(Writing help from @puppybytes and @joeriri)
